law.catch_line: Proceedings on retransfer when defendant is in custody.
law.text: If the defendant is in custody at the time the retransfer under KRS 452.290 is ordered, the court shall order his removal by the sheriff or jailer of the county, with such sufficient guards as the court directs, and his delivery to the jailer of the county to which the retransfer is made.
law.history: Repealed in part 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 61. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1122.
